channel.title: Project-others on Jack Vine - Game Programming
channel.description: Recent content in Project-others on Jack Vine - Game Programming

item.title: Photoshop Scripts
item.description: Scripts I have written for Photoshop to aid development of my projects. Animation Exporter A script for exporting frames from multiple animations contained within one document, created as a tool to aid development of Alistair’s Chest. Download & Instructions on GitHub

item.title: Custom OpenGL Graphics Engine in C++
item.description: A custom graphics engine written in C++ using OpenGL. Download Here | View Source Code on GitHub This custom graphics engine was written using C++ and OpenGL, utilising AIE’s Bootstrap, which includes a few extra things such as ImGui. The shaders shown below were written in GLSL. This graphics engine supports static and animated models in OBJ and FBX format, though animations are only supported in FBX. Render targets are used to display the post-processing effects shown above.

item.title: Tilemap Editor
item.description: A basic tile-map editor. Not intended to replace full-featured programs, but rather as useful practice for tools development (a school assignment). Download Here | Source Code is Available Here A screenshot of the working application. The tile map featured here is not my own, and was sourced from opengameart.org

item.title: Importance - Pebble Watchface
item.description: Importance is a watchface that displays the most basic and important information in an easy to read manner. Includes time, date, battery bar and a Bluetooth disconnection indicator. View Here | View Source Code in Github Images
